Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui

This package serves as the foundation for the Windows Phone 7/ Metro User Interface library written by Thomas Barrasso.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
WPTheme.OnThemeChangeListener Listener to be notified when the accent color or theme has changed.
Note: this should NOT be used by widgets to know when to change accent color/ theme unless it is necessary.
 

Class Summary
WPFonts Simple class containing static references to specified fonts in the /assets/fonts/ directory.
WPFonts.FontSet A set of Typefaces to be used by android.view.Views.
WPTheme Globally accessible color theme manager.
WPTheme.Operation Represents a file operation, in the context of WPTheme either a read/ write to the color preference file.
WPTheme.ThemeTask By moving the write operations of the color preference file to an AsyncTask responsiveness is improved and doing so no longer holds up the UI.
 

Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui Description

This package serves as the foundation for the Windows Phone 7/ Metro User Interface library written by Thomas Barrasso. Most classes will be found in sub-packages, however, a few miscellaneous classes remain here. They contain utilities used throughout the entire library. These classes are relatively fundamental and should not be altered.

The developer of this library may be contacted at contact@tombarrasso.com, but this library is provided for non-commercial use and without a warranty explicit or implied of any kind so support is provided at the developer's will.
